metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11098 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
Insufficient input validation in MdeModulePkg in EDKII may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege, denial of service and/or information disclosure via physical access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-11098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 2021.05-1
ovmf-ia32 - 2021.05-1
qemu-efi - 2021.05-1
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2021.05-1
qemu-efi-arm - 2021.05-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2021.05-1').
